subcontent.content: The bomb can be shoved or teleported and can share space with other characters, though it can't share space with other bombs. When any character enters a bomb's space, they can remove it from the battlefield. At the end of their turn, they may place it on any free adjacent space. Characters can only carry one bomb at once.

Once a round, you may gamble at the end of any turn other than yours, after all bombs have been placed. All bombs explode, dealing damage equal to the gamble result in a small blast area effect centered on them. Characters in the area of multiple explosions are only affected once.
